languages.text: "Планета опутана пульсирующими венами... Жилы, сплетенные из боли... Но что это? Причуды прошлого — или предупреждение из грядущего..."

traits.locale_text: "Планета опутана пульсирующими венами... Жилы, сплетенные из боли... Но что это? Причуды прошлого — или предупреждение из грядущего..."

languages.text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."
languages.original_text: "Планета опутана пульсирующими венами... Жилы, сплетенные из боли... Но что это? Причуды прошлого — или предупреждение из грядущего..."

traits.locale_text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."
"The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."
"The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."
"The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."

languages.text: « La planète est zébrée de veines pulsant dans la roche... Des fibres tissées dans la douleur... Mais que sont-elles, en réalité ? Une anomalie du passé... ou un avertissement du futur... »
languages.original_text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."

traits.locale_text: « La planète est zébrée de veines pulsant dans la roche... Des fibres tissées dans la douleur... Mais que sont-elles, en réalité ? Une anomalie du passé... ou un avertissement du futur... »

languages.text: “这颗行星布满了搏动的血管……痛苦编织的脉络……但那到底是什么呢？是过去发生的异象，还是来自未来的警告……”
languages.original_text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."

traits.locale_text: “这颗行星布满了搏动的血管……痛苦编织的脉络……但那到底是什么呢？是过去发生的异象，还是来自未来的警告……”

languages.text: 「この惑星には脈打つ血管が張り巡らされているわ。痛みで編まれた糸…でも、それは何なの？過去の異変か…それとも、未来からの警告か…」
languages.original_text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星には脈打つ血管が張り巡らされているわ。痛みで編まれた糸…でも、それは何なの？過去の異変か…それとも、未来からの警告か…」

languages.text: "Der Planet ist durchzogen von pulsierenden Adern ... Aus Schmerz gewobenen Strähnen ... Doch was sind sie? Eine Absonderlichkeit aus der Vergangenheit ... oder eine Warnung aus der Zukunft ..."
languages.original_text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Planet ist durchzogen von pulsierenden Adern ... Aus Schmerz gewobenen Strähnen ... Doch was sind sie? Eine Absonderlichkeit aus der Vergangenheit ... oder eine Warnung aus der Zukunft ..."

languages.text: «El planeta está lleno de venas latientes... hebras de dolor... pero ¿qué son? ¿Una anomalía del pasado... o una advertencia del futuro?».
languages.original_text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."

traits.locale_text: «El planeta está lleno de venas latientes... hebras de dolor... pero ¿qué son? ¿Una anomalía del pasado... o una advertencia del futuro?».

languages.text: "Gezegenin yüzeyi, sürekli fışkıran damarlarla kaplı... Acıyla dokunmuş iplikler... Nedir bunlar? Geçmişten kalma bir tuhaflık mı yoksa gelecekten bir uyarı mı?"
languages.original_text: "The planet is laced with pulsating veins... Strands woven from pain... But what are they? An oddity of the past — or a warning from the future..."
